name: url
description: link to insect profile page (usually Wikipedia); if localized page not available, an English one is provided

name: images
description: list of more urls of representative images

name: red_list
description: conservation status and extinction risk from IUCN Red List of Threatened Species

name: danger
description:
tags suggesting the danger of the insect, possible values:
harmless to human health
bites or stings
bites pets
disease transmission
rash or skin irritation
allergenic
non-venomous
mildly venomous
highly venomous

name: danger_description
description: short description of the danger of the insect

name: role
description:
tags suggesting the role of the insect in the environment and its interaction with humans, possible values:
beneficial
pollinator
agriculture or garden pest
household pest
wood destroying
